title: Unified XDP-SIMD Stack
description: Create an integrated architecture combining eBPF/XDP for pre-kernel filtering and steering with SIMD (AVX2/GFNI) for line-rate matrix solving, realization via N-API and zero-copy UMEM handoffs.
author: Engineer

dialogue.note: Architected a three-tier stack: eBPF/XDP for filtering, AF_XDP for zero-copy handoff, and GFNI/AVX2 for hardware-speed solving.
